descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/Mod%20Titles/PlateArmours.png[/img]

[url=http://p3d.in/4kSHz/subd]3D Preview - Coat of Plates Armour[/url]

Dark Coat of Plates Armour is a StandAlone release of the  [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/798555-credo-wip/]Credo - WIP[/url]

This mod adds 2 unique armour\'s to the game, they are the equivalent of Steel armour stat wise, and craft-able with the steel smith perk, you can also temper the armour like any other and the ingredients again are the same as crafting standard steel armour. There are NO resources used from Dawnguard whatsoever, the armour has been created by my self using a variety of components from the Witcher 2 armours legally ported over to Skyrim, by the wonderful L0rd0fWar and AlphaWolf.[/color][/b]

[youtube]yxehTHmVbnc[/youtube][youtube]TYYrv0H8dA0[/youtube]

VERSION 1.5 INFO: 

Fixed issue with normals not displaying on armour, also replaced Klappvisier helm with a lighter version of the Dark Great helm.

VERSION 1.0 INFO: IMPORTANT PRE-INSTALLATION INFO

Pre-Installation:


You MUST have Skyrim patched to the latest 1.8 update for this mod to work.

Please remove all previous .esp\'s from the Dark Coat of Plates Armour mods.

It would also be wise to delete the following 2 folders for space saving purposes on your HDD before installing the lastest version.


C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\meshes\\credo\\non faction\\armour\\dark coat of plates

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\textures\\credo\\non faction\\armour\\dark coat of plates

[img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/Mod%20Titles/Installation.png[/img]

Please make sure you delete the previous version of this mod BEFORE installing v2.0 then:

Copy the data folder into your game directory.. Yes to merge folders..

With steam this will be:

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\


[img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/Mod%20Titles/Credits.png[/img]


Dejawolf for the superb Helm, mesh and texture 

L0rd0fWar and AlphaWolf for their hard work porting Witcher 2 assets

Nightasy for his essential tutorial videos - [url=http://nightasy.com/index.php]Nightasy Website[/url]

CD Project RED for the Witcher 2

Bethesda for Skyrim and the CK

All CK work, skinnig/rigging, customisation of components used and re-texture work done by my self


[img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/Mod%20Titles/Permissions.png[/img]


Assets assembled into the new model by my self are free to use with out requesting permission, with the following exeptions:

1- Any assets I have been granted permission to use in the creation of this mod, will need to have permission requested from you
if you wish to use them.

2- Credit must be given to Dejawolf from the TaleWorlds forums for his creation of the Helm mesh and texture.

I would also just hope to be credited if you use any parts of any of my mods.

[img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/Mod%20Titles/OtherMods.png[/img]
[color=\"#FFA500\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26321]Northman Armour[/url][/color]
[color=\"#FFA500\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26904/]Cleric Armours[/url][/color]

Thank you and I hope you enjoy.[/center]
author: ActusReus
